scripts.lighthouse: npm run build && npm run start & timeout /t 5 && lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --view --preset=desktop --chrome-flags="--headless" && taskkill /IM node.exe /F
scripts.lighthouse:mobile: npm run build && npm run start & timeout /t 5 && lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --view --preset=mobile --chrome-flags="--headless" && taskkill /IM node.exe /F
